accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: Access to the "{{toolName}}" feature is currently disabled for maintenance. Please check back later.

drugRef.pageSubtitle: Search US FDA drug label information via OpenFDA.
drugRef.importantDisclaimerText:
This tool provides information primarily sourced from OpenFDA (US FDA). Where official data is unavailable for certain fields, **Artificial Intelligence (AI) may be used to supplement the information.**

All information, whether from official sources or AI, is for **informational and educational purposes ONLY.** It may not be complete, fully up-to-date, or applicable outside the US. **AI-generated content requires extra scrutiny and verification.**

This tool **DOES NOT substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.** Always consult your doctor or pharmacist regarding medications and health concerns. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking it because of something you have read here.
drugRef.searchCardDescription: Enter a drug name (generic or brand)
drugRef.noResultsFound: No results found for the search term.
drugRef.promptSearch: Enter a drug name above and click Search.
drugRef.accessDeniedLevel: Access denied for your current subscription level.
drugRef.failedToCheckAccess: Failed to check feature access. Please try again.
drugRef.toastAccessCheckError: Could not verify feature access at this time.
drugRef.toastCannotSearch: You cannot perform a search at this time. Please upgrade your plan or check your quota.
drugRef.errorNotFound: No results found for "{{searchTerm}}". Please check spelling or try another name.
drugRef.errorFetchingData: An error occurred while fetching data. Please check your network connection and try again later.
drugRef.accessDeniedDefault: You do not have permission to access this feature.

medicalCalculatorPage.pageSubtitle: Calculate common clinical values. For informational purposes only.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.defaultMessage: You do not have permission to access this feature.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This calculator is intended for informational and educational purposes only and does not substitute for professional medical diagnosis, advice, or treatment. Normal values can vary. Always consult with a qualified healthcare professional for accurate interpretation and recommendations.

error.title: Error
error.bmiInputs: BMI: Please enter valid positive numbers for weight (kg) and height (cm).
error.bsaInputs: BSA: Please enter valid positive numbers for weight (kg) and height (cm).
error.egfrInputs: eGFR: Please enter valid positive numbers for creatinine (mg/dL), age, and select sex.
error.ibwInputs: IBW: Please enter a valid positive height (cm) and select sex.
error.adjbwActualWeightInput: AdjBW: Please enter a valid positive Actual Body Weight (kg).
error.adjbwIbwRequired: AdjBW: Please calculate Ideal Body Weight (IBW) first.
error.bmrInputs: BMR: Please enter valid positive numbers for weight (kg), height (cm), age, and select sex.
error.correctedCaInputs: Corrected Ca: Please enter valid positive numbers for Total Calcium (mg/dL) and Albumin (g/dL).

interpretation.typical: BSA is often used by clinicians for drug dosing or physiological assessments. Typical adult values range from 1.5 to 2.2 m².

interpretation.stage1_desc: Normal or high kidney function (check for kidney damage if other signs present).
interpretation.stage3a_desc: Mild to moderately decreased kidney function.
interpretation.stage3b_desc: Moderate to severely decreased kidney function.

interpretation.devine: This is an estimation using the Devine formula. IBW is often used for ventilator settings or certain drug dosages.

interpretation.notTypicallyCalculated: Adjusted Body Weight is typically calculated when Actual Body Weight significantly exceeds Ideal Body Weight (e.g., >120%).
interpretation.purpose: AdjBW estimates a relevant body mass for dosing certain drugs in obese patients. It's used when Actual Weight significantly exceeds Ideal Weight.

interpretation.definition: This is the estimated minimum calories your body needs at rest. Total daily energy needs depend on activity levels.

interpretation.prefix: Corrected for Albumin ({{albumin}} g/dL). This estimates calcium if albumin were normal (4.0 g/dL).
interpretation.belowRange: Result is below the typical normal range (approx. 8.5-10.5 mg/dL).
interpretation.aboveRange: Result is above the typical normal range (approx. 8.5-10.5 mg/dL).
interpretation.withinRange: Result is within the typical normal range (approx. 8.5-10.5 mg/dL).

nutritionDatabase.pageSubtitle: Search the FoodData Central database for nutritional information

nutritionDatabase.searchInputPlaceholder: Search for a food item (e.g., Apple)
nutritionDatabase.toastInputErrorDescription: Please enter a food item to search.
nutritionDatabase.toastApiKeyMissingSearch: API key is missing. Please check your environment configuration.
nutritionDatabase.toastNoResultsForQuery: No results found for your query: {{query}}
nutritionDatabase.toastAccessCheckError: Could not verify feature access at this time.
nutritionDatabase.toastCannotSearchDescription: You cannot perform a search at this time.
nutritionDatabase.unexpectedDetailError: An unexpected error occurred fetching details.
